channel.title: Need help with mopar scape cache
channel.description: Well first off, my computer crashed awhile back and i re-installed windows XP, and now morparscape doesn't work anymore. when i load up moparscape with the Aryan client, it immediately closes it self and i get an error: [img]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s114/15miL_2007/untitled.jpg[/img] Btw, sorry the image is so big, hit the print screen button, so when i try and shrink it, you cant see what it says in the Runningbot window. Please help :/

item.title: Need help with mopar scape cache
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

ChrisOwnz43, You can bypass the “administrator crap.” go to start>run> type in cmd or go to command prompt manually.
type in “net user” and look for administrator name then type in “net user administratorname” it will show all the info for the administrator, then type in "net user administrator name * " or "net(space)user(space)administratorname(space)*(asterik)or(shift8) type in a new pass word and your done. =)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with mopar scape cache

item.title: Need help with mopar scape cache
item.dc:creator: @ChrisOwnz43 ChrisOwnz43
item.description:
@ChrisOwnz43 wrote:

I found out the problem, im not an administrator and the files never were downloaded…>:| i wish i could bypass the administrator crap

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with mopar scape cache

item.title: Need help with mopar scape cache
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

Firstly Image: Cut & Paste?

Secondly Mopar: Do you have wireless?
If so, this might be why it comes up with connection lost…
Thirdly:
If you don’t have wireless, this problem should be easily fixable by doing one of two things.
1 . Make sure that when you run mopar, you run it as an administrator.
2. If that fails, download the cache manually at “moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip” and extract it to c:/windows/mpr_file_store32/Extract Here

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with mopar scape cache
